JOB DESCRIPTION:
Trainee Software Engineer - Web Application Trainee Software Engineer - Web Application Pelican is a leading provider of payment and compliance solutions to corporates and financial institutions of all types and sizes in the Americas,  Europe,  the Middle East and Asia-Pacific. Pelican puts intelligent automation,  compliance and control firmly at the heart of payments and other transactions processing. Financial institutions and corporates worldwide rely on Pelican to manage and control their payments securely,  improve operational efficiencies and lower risk and IT costs.
 The Trainee Software Engineer - Web Application ensures that development activities are done efficiently without any bugs.
   Key Responsibilities 
 Module programming,  unit testing and integration testing
 Quality management of own work
 Review of code,  documents and test cases

   Essential Skills 
Mandatory Skills: WebService(Restful api) ,  Spring,  hibernate/ Mybatis
Working experience in REST Web Services with JSON/ XML
Frontend technologies like HTML5,  JSF,  JavaScript,  JQuery,  AngularJS,  BootStrap Framework,  Sencha Framework,  D3 Charts Core Java
Good understanding of WebSphere Application Server,  Oracle
Problem solving and debugging skills
Proactive in solvingissues
 Proactive in learning new skills
 Process Adherence
 Good communication (email/ oral) skills

  Additional Skills 
SWING
UML,  IBM Rational Application Developer,  Design Patterns
Good presentation skills
 No. of Position
